summary: Adds a small dungeon/quest with unique sword awarded
descriptionHtml:
Okay, so i wanted to add a new sword to the game but didn\'t want to just put it in the crafting list.

I made a little dungeon just north of riverwood called the Shadow Lair.
It\'s map marked straight off so no wandering round searching.
Inside you\'ll come across a dead body and reading his note starts \'The Brothers\' quest and grants you access to the rest of the dungeon. 
It\'s very small but tells a little story.

It may be part of a larger quest later but for now there are some other things i would like to do.
This sword was made by request from cashyyy so kudos should be shared his way.

Basically i just followed the tutorials on the creation kit site to start but done some neat things with scripts (now there\'s a headache).

Install to your Data folder or use NMM.
Un-install, remove ShadowLair esp/bsa from your data folder or use NMM.

Credits to the original artists for my inspiration.
author: thebrommers
